interfaces.header: Interfaces for discovery and analysis of SIDS data

profiles.description: Country profiles for Small Island Developing States with data across the pillars of the UNDPâ€™s SIDS Offer, financial statistics, and vulnerability index.

indicators.description: A database of over 4000 development indicators for SIDS, compiled from 22 sources and featured alongside visualization and analytic tools.

portfolio.description: A digital tool for analyzing the UNDP SIDS Offer Portfolio across the SDGs, SAMOA Pathway priorities, and six UNDP Signature Solutions.

gis.description: A SIDS GIS portal and database compiled from more than 80 datasets and research studies with coverage of Small Island Developing States.

mvi.description: A customizable Multidimensional Vulnerability Index (MVI) for SIDS to analyze environmental, geographic, economic, and financial vulnerability.

handbook.description: A database of over 4000 development indicators for SIDS, compiled from 22 sources and featured alongside visualization and analytic tools.

catalog.description: Geospatial layers standardized from more than 80 unique data sources including open source studies and databases relevant to development in SIDS.

manual.header: Manual for the UNDP SIDS Data Platform
manual.description: Learn more about the SIDS Data Platform and how to interact with each interface and data visualization and analysis tool.
